name: Fintech Lusaka Hackathon
body:
### Welcome to FinTech Lusaka Hackathon.

## Theme
This Hackathon brings together FinTech developers, ideators and designers to develop financial products & services and apply new technologies to solving problems. Example applications include innovations in risk management, trading, investing, personal finance, big data, retail banking, regulatory compliance, mobile payments and social enterprise. 

## Reference documentation

* [ProBase](http://www.probasegroup.com/)
* [Google Cloud Platform](https://cloud.google.com/docs/)
* [Blockchain](https://blockchain.info/api)
* [Open Bank Project](https://openbankproject.com/apps/)

## Presentations

* [Probase](http://www.probasegroup.com/)
* [Google Cloud presentation](https://cloudwebinars.withgoogle.com/live/building-node-js-emea)
* [The Open Bank Project: Values, Purpose, Strategy](https://openbankproject.com/)
* [Blockchain](https://blockchain.info/)

## Deployment

* [Google Cloud Codelabs for the event](https://codelabs.developers.google.com/?cat=Cloud) (ask for user Credits on site):   
* [Sample Code](https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/)

## Packaging

For developers to deploy directly, use https://console.cloud.google.com/
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
